title: Realised I prayed 3 rakahs instead of 4 after concluding my Asr prayer, what to do? assim al hakeem
transcript: so the scenario is a person praying answer he prayed three rakas sat for the shahud in the third raka and concluded his Salat by offering two salams after that it came to him that whoops I still have one raka to do immediately you should say Allahu Akbar and stand up for your fourth raka complete your fourth raka as usual sit for the Tasha Hood offer your Salam then offer two prostrations of forgetfulness and offer another Salam and by that your prayer is valid
